name: Calorie Calculator
author: mgplugin

sections.description:
For using This plugin you Can Know That How Many calories You burn daily.

you can know the perfect amount of calories to eat if you want to maintain and lose your body weigth.

To run this plugin you need to put shortcode in your page.
([calorie_calculator])

Features:

  • Easy to use
  • Select activity
  • Customize header title text and font size with title color
  • Set form title color and background color
  • Customize Field active and activity field hover color
  • Customize Calculate button text and background color
  • Customize button text hover color, background hover color
  • Set calorie message background and text color
  • Set title tab background and active background color
  • Change list background and text color
sections.installation:
1. Download the file to install and activate.
  2. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
